name: Next Please
description:
"Next Please" is a game about quick reflexes, the difficulty scales up based on your score, so don't lose focus!

Use "WASD" or arrow keys to pick the right pack (the one shown on the computer monitor) and gain points based on the number of satisfied customers (which is also their ticket number! just like a real queue).

Created by: 

Game developer: Matteo Cordioli 
Game artist & Game music: Alessandro Curà
Game design: both of us

Quarantine Jam
Theme: Pack
